actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967 to require congressional action to effectuate increases in the rates of pay for Members of Congress and certain officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.

summary.text: Requires congressional action to effectuate increases in the rates of pay for Members of Congress and certain officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government under the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967. (Amends 2 U.S.C. 359)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Postal Revenue and Federal Salary Act of 1967 to require congressional action to effectuate increases in the rates of pay for Members of Congress and certain officers and employees in the legislative branch of the Government.
